summary: CLONE Dugout MENA V2 - some videos not loading, possible caching issue
ALTV Web V2: DUGOUT MENA - Dugout link not working in responsive mode
Front End: Playlist icon sometimes not displaying on player even when a playlist is bound to the player
ALTV Web V2: Dugout MENA - Videos jitter when I navigate away from page
ALTV Web V2: Profile - Competences - Your profile completion increases by 4% instead of 5%
description:
*Steps to reproduce:*
# Navigate to v2.altv.com and log in
# Go to Your Profile
# Click 'Add now' to add a new competence
# Add just 1 competence

*Expected result:* 
Your profile completion increases by 5%.

*Actual result:*
Your profile completion increases by 4%. Should increase by 5%. See images attached.

cc: [~brendan]

summary: ALTV Web V2: Profile - Work Experience - NOT able to add an End Date which later than today's date
description:
*Steps to reproduce:*
# Navigate to v2.altv.com and log in
# Go to Your Profile
# Go Work Experience and click 'Add new'
# Put in an End Date which later than today's date

*Expected result:* 
You are able to add an End Date which later than today's date, eg: 14/Feb/2020.

*Actual result:*
You are NOT able to add an End Date which later than today's date. See images attached.

cc: [~brendan]

summary: ALTV Web V2: Profile - Work Experience - 'End Date' text-box should turn red if 'Start Date' is later than it
description:
*Steps to reproduce:*
# Navigate to v2.altv.com and log in
# Go to Your Profile
# Go Work Experience and click 'Add new'
# Put in a Start Date 
# Put in an End Date which is earlier than the start date

*Expected result:* 
The 'End Date' text-box should turn red if 'Start Date' is later than it. This will indicate to the user that they cannot pick an 'End Date' earlier than the 'Start Date'.

*Actual result:*
The 'End Date' text-box remains green even if 'Start Date' is later than it.

cc: [~brendan]

summary: ALTV Web V2: Profile - Work Experience - 'Start Date' text-box has no overlay text with today's date
description:
*Steps to reproduce:*
# Navigate to v2.altv.com and log in
# Go to Your Profile
# Go to Work Experience and click Add New
# Have a look at the 'Start - End Date' text-box

*Expected result:* 
The Start Date text-box should have an overlay text with today's date, just like the 'End Date'

*Actual result:*
The 'Start Date' text-box has no overlay text with today's date

cc: [~brendan]

summary: ALTV Web V2: Profile - Work Experience - 'Add now' button has no shadow underneath
description:
*Steps to reproduce:*
# Navigate to v2.altv.com and log in
# Go to Your Profile
# Go to Work Experience and click Add New
# Have a look at the 'Add now' button

*Expected result:* 
The 'Add now' button should have a shadow underneath it, just like the 'Cancel' button.

*Actual result:*
The 'Add now' button does not have a shadow underneath it.

cc: [~brendan]

summary: ALTV Web V2: Profile - Work Experience - Clicking 'Add new' opens up all text-boxes in red outline
description:
*Steps to reproduce:*
# Navigate to v2.altv.com and log in
# Go to Your Profile
# Go to Work Experience and click Add New

*Expected result:* 
Clicking 'Add new' should just open up all the text-boxes as normal, not with a red-outline. 

*Actual result:*
Clicking 'Add new' opens up all text-boxes in red outline. This makes it look like you have input something wrong even though you have not.

cc: [~brendan]
